Package com.diy.hardware

Class AttendantStation

java.lang.Object
com.diy.hardware.AttendantStation
public class AttendantStation extends Object
Represents the station used by the attendant.

An attendant station possesses:

  • one touch screen; and,
  • one QWERTY keyboard.

All other functionality of the attendant station must be performed in software. A given DIY self-checkout station can be attended by at most one attendant station.

  • Method Details

    • attendedStations

      public List<DoItYourselfStation> attendedStations()
      Accesses the list of attended self-checkout stations.
      Returns:
      An immutable list of the self-checkout stations attended by this attendant station.

    • attendedStationCount

      public int attendedStationCount()
      Obtains the number of self-checkout stations attended by this attendant station.
      Returns:
      The count, which will always be non-negative.

    • add

      public void add(DoItYourselfStation station)
      Adds a self-checkout station to the ones attended by this attendant station.
      Parameters:
      station - The self-checkout station to be added to the attendance of this attendant station.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If station is null.
      IllegalStateException - If station is already attended.

    • remove

      public boolean remove(DoItYourselfStation station)
      Removes the indicated station from the ones attended by this attendant station.
      Parameters:
      station - The station to be removed from attendance.
      Returns:
      true, if the indicated station was successfully removed from attendance; otherwise, false.
